review_data.title: Best Italian food in Zurich
review_data.content: Food was amazing, but even better was the service. Giovanni and Luca took exceptional care of us on our honeymoon. Don’t think twice. Go immediately and enjoy!!

review_data.title: Good and central
review_data.content: Went for dinner with friends on a Monday evening. Good food, good wine, friendly staff, good service. The restaurant caters for tour groups

review_data.title: Excellent Restaurant
review_data.content: It was amazing. The staff was incredible. The owner greets you and treats you so well. The food was incredible. Just loved the restaurant. Everyone thought it was one of the best Italian restaurants. Excellent.

review_data.title: Fresh, Delicious Italian Food in Zurich
review_data.content: My new favourite in downtown Zurich Niederdorf. Exceptionally friendly and attentive service, and delicious soul food with a Swiss-Italian touch: Seafood Pasta Pizza & Focaccia Naturally, they also serve a fine selection of wines. I have started coming here with my clients and the team...More
